meanings.sent1: She always seems to misdeal the cards when playing games.
meanings.sent2: It is important not to misdeal the cards during a card game.
meanings.sent3: The magician's misdeal of the cards made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her misdeal of the situation led to confusion among the group.
meanings.sent5: The chef's misdeal with the ingredients ruined the recipe.

meanings.definition: An error or mistake in dealing cards in a card game.
meanings.sent1: The misdeal caused a lot of confusion at the poker table.
meanings.sent2: Players must be careful to avoid a misdeal during the game.
meanings.sent3: The misdeal in the card game resulted in a lot of groans from the players.
meanings.sent4: The misdeal was so bad that they had to start the game over.
meanings.sent5: The loud gasp from the players indicated the misdeal had occurred.
